HomePage.metaTitle: ShopBase - Your One-Stop Online Shopping Destination
HomePage.metaDescription: Discover a wide range of products at unbeatable prices on ShopBase. Enjoy fast shipping, secure payments, and excellent customer service. Shop now and experience the best in online shopping!
HomePage.ogTitle: ShopBase: Elevate Your Online Shopping Experience
HomePage.ogDescription: Explore thousands of products, from fashion to electronics. Enjoy exclusive deals, fast delivery, and top-notch customer support. Start your ShopBase journey today!
HomePage.ogImageAlt: ShopBase homepage featuring a collage of popular products and happy customers
HomePage.twitterTitle: ShopBase: Where Smart Shoppers Find Amazing Deals
HomePage.twitterDescription: Join millions of satisfied customers. Shop trendy fashion, cutting-edge tech, and everything in between. Unbeatable prices, secure shopping, fast delivery!
HomePage.twitterImageAlt: Showcase of top products available on ShopBase
HomePage.keywords: online shopping, e-commerce, deals, fashion, electronics, home goods, fast shipping, secure payments

RegisterUserPage.metaTitle: Create Your ShopBase Account | Start Selling Online Today
RegisterUserPage.metaDescription: Join thousands of successful merchants on ShopBase. Create your e-commerce store, reach global customers, and grow your business with powerful tools and support.
RegisterUserPage.ogTitle: Launch Your Online Store with ShopBase - Sign Up Now
RegisterUserPage.ogDescription: Create your ShopBase account in minutes and start selling to customers worldwide. Powerful e-commerce tools, no coding required!
RegisterUserPage.ogImageAlt: ShopBase registration page featuring a laptop with an online store
RegisterUserPage.twitterTitle: Begin Your E-commerce Journey with ShopBase - Register Now!
RegisterUserPage.twitterDescription: Join ShopBase and transform your business idea into a thriving online store. Easy setup, powerful features, global reach.
RegisterUserPage.heading: Start Your E-commerce Success Story
RegisterUserPage.subheading: Join thousands of thriving businesses on ShopBase. Create your account now to access powerful e-commerce tools, reach global markets, and turn your passion into profit.

RegisterUserSchemaErrors.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
RegisterUserSchemaErrors.confirmPasswordMinLength: Confirm Password must be at least 8 characters
RegisterUserSchemaErrors.captchaFailed: Captcha verification failed; please confirm you are not a robot.

LoginPage.metaTitle: Log In to Your ShopBase Account | Access Your Dashboard
LoginPage.metaDescription: Log in to your ShopBase account to manage your e-commerce store, track your sales, and access powerful tools to grow your business.
LoginPage.ogTitle: Access Your ShopBase Account - Log In Now
LoginPage.ogDescription: Log in to ShopBase to manage your online store, view your sales, and use powerful e-commerce features. Your business dashboard is just a click away!
LoginPage.ogImageAlt: ShopBase login page featuring a user accessing their e-commerce dashboard
LoginPage.twitterTitle: Log In to ShopBase - Manage Your Online Store Effortlessly
LoginPage.twitterDescription: Access your ShopBase account to track your sales, manage your store, and utilize powerful tools. Log in now to continue growing your business.
LoginPage.heading: Welcome Back to ShopBase
LoginPage.subheading: Log in to your account to manage your store, track your sales, and access the tools you need to succeed. Your business is waiting for you!
